p:
Where Y
i is the actual value of EO deposed in the matrix, Å·
i is the value of EO predicted by the model of the ATR-FTIR spectrum for the sample, n is the number of samples used in each data set, and Sd is the standard deviation for the EO quantity in the calibration data set. The limit of detection (LOD) and the limit of quantification (LOQ) of the CLS methods were calculated with the guidelines of the International Conference on Harmonisation (ICH)[ 28].
